values: Why Is the Glory of God at Stake in Making People Plural?Why Is the Glory of God at Stake in Making People Plural?

God is ransoming a people for himself from every tribe, tongue, and nation. Therefore, missions is a call to the people groups of the world, not just the countries of the world.
